Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of Archangel Gabriel, the Feast of the Annunciation, and the month of Koiahk:

Text.Language: Hiten nip~recbia n~te piar,iaggeloc eyouab Gabri/l pifaisennoufi: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the intercessions of the holy archangel Gabriel, the herald of glad tidings: O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
بشفاعات رئيس الملائكة الطاهر غبريال المبشر. ياربُ أنعم علينا بمغفرة خطايانا.
